医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究调查了暴露组评分与整个童年时期代谢健康之间的联系环境暴露和不健康的生活习惯的综合影响对儿童心脏代谢健康的影响可能超出其单独影响的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-investigates-the-link- Between-an-exposome-score-and-metabolic-health-across-childhood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Study-investigates-the-link- Between-an-exposome-score-and-metabolic-health-across-childhood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8734aa-0017-40b4-9f18-915045081c30 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:35:44 -0400 Study investigates the link between an exposome score and metabolic health across childhood
新发现揭示了人工智能在临床环境中的潜力美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员发现，人工智能 (AI) 模型能够高精度地解决医疗测验问题，旨在测试卫生专业人员根据临床图像和简短文本摘要诊断患者的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-findings-shed-light-on-AIs-pottial-in-clinical-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-findings-shed-light-on-AIs-pottial-in-clinical-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a17fcec1-00ab-4e8c-b99a-7186c643c638 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:10:40 -0400 New findings shed light on AI's potential in clinical settings
新方法可快速测定病毒感染性一种可以快速确定病毒是否具有传染性或非传染性的新方法可能会彻底改变对未来流行病的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-method-can-rapidly-define-virus-infectivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/New-method-can-rapidly-define-virus-infectivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b1c740-798f-496b-a35d-f35c367a5ce4 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 07:04:21 -0400 New method can rapidly determine virus infectivity
较高的大脑护理分数与较低的晚年抑郁风险相关晚年抑郁症通常被定义为在 60 岁以上的个体中发病的抑郁症，可能影响多达三分之一或更多的 60 岁以上的人，并且可能使人衰弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Higher-Brain-Care-Score-linked-with-lower-risk-of-late-life-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Higher-Brain-Care-Score-linked-with-lower-risk-of-late-life-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=078b81b3-fe5c-4e5a-8bf0-5d02f6ca2fd0 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 06:51:26 -0400 Higher Brain Care Score associated with lower risk of late-life depression
为什么数百万人正在尝试 FDA 授权的大型制药公司减肥药的替代品药剂师 Mark Mikhael 在过去 12 个月里减掉了 50 磅。他不再患有糖尿病，并发现自己“处于理想体重”，胆固醇 20 年来首次低于 200。 “我感觉棒极了，”他说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Why-millions-are-trying-FDA-authorized-alternatives-to-big-pharmae​​28099s-weight-loss-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Why-millions-are-trying-FDA-authorized-alternatives-to-big-pharmae​​28099s-weight-loss-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90e44278-2bbd-4796-a0fc-d8d4d3d59d42 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 06:31:02 -0400 Why millions are trying FDA-authorized alternatives to big pharma’s weight loss drugs

COVID-19 对孕产妇死亡率的影响需要重新思考公共卫生策略在 SARS-CoV-2 大流行高峰期间，智利的孕产妇死亡率有所上升。基于智利卫生部卫生统计和信息部（DEIS）数据的自然群体实验证实了这一点。该研究发表在公共科学图书馆全球公共卫生杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/COVID-19s-impact-on-maternal-mortality-demands-rethink-of-public-health-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/COVID-19s-impact-on-maternal-mortality-demands-rethink-of-public-health-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a379e0f7-167e-4d11-ac86-f27dae8125e3 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 02:23:04 -0400 COVID-19's impact on maternal mortality demands rethink of public health strategies
